app.title: Cannabis Strain Recommender
app.subtitle: Find the perfect cannabis strain based on your medical conditions and desired effects.

messages.first_time_setup: First-time setup: Training models... (this takes ~30 seconds)
messages.run_training: Please make sure you have run `python train_models.py` first.
messages.no_selection: Please select at least one medical condition or desired effect.
messages.no_recommendations: No recommendations found. Try adjusting your selections.

help.method_help: **Global KNN** searches across all 2,921 strains. **Cluster-based KNN** first groups you with similar medical profiles, then searches within that group.
help.desired_help: Select positive effects you're looking for
help.avoid_help: Select negative effects you want to minimize
help.num_help: Number of strain recommendations to display

method.cluster_knn: Cluster-based KNN (Match by medical profile first)

form.conditions_label: Select the medical conditions you want to treat:
form.desired_label: What effects do you want to feel?
form.avoid_label: What effects do you want to avoid?

about.title: About this App
about.intro: This app uses machine learning to recommend cannabis strains based on your needs:
about.kmeans: **K-Means Clustering**: Groups strains by medical effectiveness profiles
about.knn: **K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN)**: Finds strains most similar to your preferences
about.data_info: **Data**: 2,921 strains from Leafly with 39 medical conditions, 13 positive effects, and 6 negative effects.
about.distance_title: **Distance Score**: This is the Euclidean distance between your profile and each strain in the 58-dimensional feature space.
about.distance_lower: - **Lower values = better matches** (typically 5-15 for good matches)
about.distance_not_percent: - Not a percentage - it's a similarity metric
about.distance_top: - The top recommendation has the smallest distance to your ideal profile
